en.answer: In that case, that effect is no longer applied.
en.question: If a Fusion Monster Special Summoned by the effect of <<7262>> is later flipped to face-down Defense Position by the effect of <<7752>>, what happens with the applied effect that prevents it from being targeted by the opponent's card effects?
en.title: What happens if the monster Fusion Summoned using <<7262>> is flipped face-down?
